plot: After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

title: Spirited Away (2001)
plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Star Trek: The Original Series Motion Picture Franchise (1979 - 1991)
movieTitle: Star Trek: The Original Series Motion Picture Franchise

title: Stepbrothers (2008)
plot: In a military family, an illegitimate son is brutalized by his brothers. A patriarchal, feudalistic household where dissent is forbidden is used to reveal the whole imperialist system that afflicted Japan between 1921 and 1946.

title: Strong Island (2017)
plot: When filmmaker Yance Ford investigates the 1992 murder of a young black man, it becomes an achingly personal journey since the victim, 24-year-old William Ford Jr., was the filmmaker's brother.

title: Superbad (2007)
plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

title: Support the Girls (2018)
plot: The general manager at a highway-side ''sports bar with curves" has her incurable optimism and faith, in her girls, her customers, and herself, tested over the course of a long, strange day.

title: Tangerine (2015)
plot: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.

title: The Beach (2000)
plot: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

title: The Big Chill (1983)
plot: A group of seven former college friends gather for a week-end reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

title: The Book Club (2018)
plot: N/A

title: The Boss (2016)
plot: A titan of industry is sent to prison after she's caught insider trading. When she emerges ready to rebrand herself as America's latest sweetheart, not everyone she screwed over is so quick to forgive and forget.

title: The Bounty Hunter (2010)
plot: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

title: The Call Of The Wild (2020)
plot: A sled dog struggles for survival in the wilds of the Yukon.

title: The Christmas Setup (2020)
plot: As they enjoy the local holidays together, Hugo and Patrick's attraction to each other is undeniable but as Hugo receives word of a big promotion requiring a move to London, he must decide what is most important to him.

title: The Craft (1996)
plot: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.

title: The Devil Wears Prada (2006)
plot: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

title: The Duff (2015)
plot: A high school senior instigates a social pecking order revolution after finding out that she has been labeled the DUFF - Designated Ugly Fat Friend - by her prettier, more popular counterparts.

title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
plot: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

title: The Five Year Engagement (2012)
plot: One year after meeting, Tom proposes to his girlfriend, Violet, but unexpected events keep tripping them up as they look to walk down the aisle together.

title: The Glass Castle (2017)
plot: A young girl comes of age in a dysfunctional family of nonconformist nomads with a mother who's an eccentric artist and an alcoholic father who would stir the children's imagination with hope as a distraction to their poverty.

title: The Gods Must Be Crazy (1980)
plot: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

title: The Guilt Trip (2012)
plot: As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.

title: The Half of It (2020)
plot: When smart but cash-strapped teen Ellie Chu agrees to write a love letter for a jock, she doesn't expect to become his friend - or fall for his crush.

title: The Hudsucker Proxy (1994)
plot: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

title: The Incredible Jessica James (2017)
plot: An aspiring playwright in New York strikes up a friendship with a guy while on the rebound from a break-up.

title: The Invisible Man (2020)
plot: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

title: The Kids Are Alright (2010)
plot: Interviews, TV clips and concert footage make up this comprehensive profile of The Who, Britain's premiere rock band.

title: The Lovers (2017)
plot: Debra Winger and Tracy Letts play a long-married, dispassionate couple who are both in the midst of serious affairs. But on the brink of calling it quits, a spark between them suddenly reignites, leading them into an impulsive romanc

title: The Martian (2015)
plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

title: The Meddler (2016)
plot: An aging widow from New York City follows her daughter to Los Angeles in hopes of starting a new life after her husband passes away.

title: The Mistle-tones (2012)
plot: A talented singer forms a musical group and challenges her rivals to a competition on Christmas Eve.

title: The Nutty Professor (1963)
plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

title: The Paper Chase (1973)
plot: A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and his relationship with the daughter of his sternest professor.

title: The Queen (2006)
plot: After the death of Princess Diana, Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

title: The Quick And The Dead (1995)
plot: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

title: The Revenant (2015)
plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: The Savages (2007)
plot: A sister and brother face the realities of familial responsibility as they begin to care for their ailing father.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty (2013)
movieTitle: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
plot: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.

title: The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Shining (1980)
plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

title: The Stuff (1985)
plot: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.

title: The Switch (2010)
plot: Seven years after the fact, a man comes to the realization that he was the sperm donor for his best friend's boy.

title: The Tenant (1976)
plot: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

title: The Thing (1982)
plot: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre (1948)

plot: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

title: The Visit (2015)
plot: Two siblings become increasingly frightened by their grandparents' disturbing behavior while visiting them on vacation.

title: The Wall (2012)
plot: Two American Soldiers are trapped by a lethal sniper, with only an unsteady wall between them.

title: Think Like a Man (2012)
plot: Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.

title: Thirteenth (2016)
plot: A computer scientist running a virtual reality simulation of 1937 becomes the primary suspect when his colleague and mentor is murdered.

title: This is Where I Leave You (2014)
movieTitle: This Is Where I Leave You
plot: After their father passes away, four grown siblings are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof for a week, along with their over-sharing mother and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens.

title: To All The Boys I Loved Before trilogy (2018 - 2021)
movieTitle: To All The Boys I Loved Before trilogy

title: To Be Takei (2014)
plot: A look at the many roles played by eclectic actor/activist George Takei, whose wit, humor and grace have helped him to become an internationally beloved figure and Internet phenomenon with 7-million Facebook fans and counting.

title: Toni Erdmann (2016)
plot: A practical joking father tries to reconnect with his hard working daughter by creating an outrageous alter ego and posing as her CEO's life coach.

title: Top Five (2014)
plot: A comedian tries to make it as a serious actor when his reality television star fiancée talks him into broadcasting their wedding on her television show.

title: Touch of Evil (1958)
plot: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

title: Tree of Life (2011)
plot: A young man searches for a mythical tree of magical powers that can save his dying father. But when he arrives, the keeper of the tree demands an horrific sacrifice.

title: Troop Zero (2020)

title: Under the Tuscan Sun (2003)
plot: A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.

title: Unfaithful (2002)
plot: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

title: Up in the Air (2009)
plot: Ryan Bingham enjoys living out of a suitcase for his job, travelling around the country firing people, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a potential love interest, and a new hire presenting a new business model.

title: Velvet Buzzsaw (2019)
plot: A satire set in the contemporary art world scene of Los Angeles, where big money artists and mega-collectors pay a high price when art collides with commerce.

title: Wendy (2020)
plot: Lost on a mysterious island where aging and time have come unglued, Wendy must fight to save her family, her freedom, and the joyous spirit of youth from the deadly peril of growing up.

title: Whale Rider (2002)
plot: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

title: What Men Want (2019)
plot: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear men's thoughts.

title: What We Do In the Shadows (2014)
movieTitle: What We Do in the Shadows
plot: Viago, Deacon and Vladislav are vampires who are finding that modern life has them struggling with the mundane - like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

title: When Harry Met Sally (1989)
plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

title: Where’s Poppa (1970)
plot: When an attorney meets the girl of his dreams, he fears that his batty mother will scare her off, so he schemes to eliminate the senile old woman.

title: Whip It (2009)
plot: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with small-town misery after discovering a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

title: Whiplash (2014)
plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: Wild (2014)
plot: A chronicle of one woman's one thousand one hundred mile solo hike undertaken as a way to recover from a recent personal tragedy.

title: Working Girl (1988)
plot: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

title: Work It (2020)
plot: When Quinn Ackerman's admission to the college of her dreams depends on her performance at a dance competition, she forms a ragtag group of dancers to take on the best squad in school...now she just needs to learn how to dance.
